FuncDef: This command configures a physical port that will act as the protection circuit for this APS group. The protect circuit port must contain only the default configuration and cannot belong to another APS group. The protect circuit port must be of the same type as the working circuit for the APS group, for the port to be added to an APS group port. If that s not the case, the command will return an error.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical port that will act as the protection circuit for this APS group in the following format.
